name: Perfect
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
Play this song with the regular shapes of the chords given in this song
or use the ones that can be heard on the recording:

     E-A-D-G-B-e
G    3-x-0-0-3(3)
Em   0-2-2-0-3(3) (= Em7)
C    x-3-2-0-3(3) (= Cadd9)

[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch]

[Verse]
          [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Em[/ch]
I found a love for me
             [ch]C[/ch]                            [ch]D[/ch]
Darling just dive right in, and follow my lead
               [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]
Well I found a girl beautiful and sweet
        [ch]C[/ch]                                     [ch]D[/ch]
I never knew you were the someone waiting for me

[Pre-Chorus]
                                [ch]G[/ch]
Cause we were just kids when we fell in love
            [ch]Em[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
Not knowing what it was, I will not give you up this ti-ime
             [ch]G[/ch]                           [ch]Em[/ch]
Darling just kiss me slow, your heart is all I own
            [ch]C[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]
And in your eyes you're holding mine

[Chorus]
      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
[ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
          [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
When you said you looked a mess, I whispered underneath my breath
         [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
But you heard it, darling you look perfect tonight

| [ch]G[/ch] [ch]D/F#[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] | [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  |

[Verse]
               [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]Em[/ch]
Well I found a woman, stronger than anyone I know
              [ch]C[/ch]                                          [ch]D[/ch]
She shares my dreams, I hope that someday I'll share her home
           [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
I found a love, to carry more than just my secrets
         [ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]D[/ch]
To carry love, to carry children of our own

[Pre-Chorus]
                             [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
We are still kids, but we're so in love, fighting against all odds
             [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
I know we'll be alright this ti-ime
             [ch]G[/ch]                              [ch]Em[/ch]
Darling just hold my hand, be my girl, I'll be your man
         [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]
I see my future in your eyes

[Chorus]
      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
[ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
        [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
When I saw you in that dress, looking so beautiful
  [ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]          [ [ch]G[/ch] ]
I don't deserve this, darling you look perfect tonight

[Interlude]
| [ch]G[/ch]  | % | [ch]Em[/ch] | % |
| [ch]C[/ch]  | % | [ch]D[/ch]  | % |

[Chorus]
      [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
Baby, I'm dancing in the dark, with you between my arms
[ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D[/ch]                [ch]Em[/ch]
Barefoot on the grass, listening to our favorite song
        [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
I have faith in what I see, now I know I have met an angel
    [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]
In person, and she looks perfect

[Outro]
  [ch]G/B[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Dadd4[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]        [ [ch]G[/ch] ]
I don't deserve this, you look perfect tonight

content.text:
Capo 2
 
Tutorial video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vhSN7nAXc9A

Chords:
G: 3x0033      A7sus4: x02033    G/F#: 2x0033     Cadd9: x32033
[ch]C[/ch]*: x32013
G*: 320003     D/F#: 20023x      Dadd4: x54035
NB for beginners, ignore the variations and just play normal C and G chords throughout, it's easier.
I put them in because it does sound better to play them, but it's not completely necessary.


[Intro]
[ch]G[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]G/F#[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]Cadd9[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]   


[Verse 1]
[ch]G[/ch]                                 [ch]G/F#[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]
White lips, pale face, breathing in snowflakes
         [ch]Cadd9[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]A7sus4[/ch]
Burnt lungs, sour taste
[ch]G[/ch]                                      [ch]G/F#[/ch]   [ch]Em[/ch]
Light’s gone, day’s end, struggling to pay rent
          [ch]Cadd9[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Long nights, strange men


[Pre-chorus]
[ch]Am7[/ch]                              [ch]C[/ch]*                   [ch]G[/ch]*
And they say she’s in the Class A Team, stuck in her daydream
                    [ch]D/F#[/ch]               [ch]Am7[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]*
Been this way since 18, but lately her face seems, slowly sinking, wasting
               [ch]G[/ch]*                            [ch]D/F#[/ch]
Crumbling like pastries, and they scream the worst things in life come free to us


[Chorus 1]
          [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]Cadd9[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Cos she's just under the upperhand, and go mad for a couple of grams
[ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
And she don’t want to go outside tonight
         [ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
And in a pipe she flies to the Motherland, or sells love to another man
[ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]Cadd9[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D/F#[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]
It’s too cold outside for angels to fly,
              [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]Cadd9[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]G/F#[/ch]
for angels to fly


[Verse 2]
[ch]G[/ch]                                          [ch]G/F#[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]
Ripped gloves, raincoat, tried to swim and stay afloat
      [ch]Cadd9[/ch]          [ch]G[/ch]         [ch]A7sus4[/ch]
Dry house, wet clothes
[ch]G[/ch]                                     [ch]G/F#[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]
Loose change, bank notes, weary-eyed, dry throat
       [ch]Cadd9[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Call girl, no phone


[Pre-chorus]
[ch]Am7[/ch]                              [ch]C[/ch]*                   [ch]G[/ch]*
And they say she’s in the Class A Team, stuck in her daydream
                    [ch]D/F#[/ch]               [ch]Am7[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]*
Been this way since 18, but lately her face seems, slowly sinking, wasting
               [ch]G[/ch]*                            [ch]D/F#[/ch]
Crumbling like pastries, and they scream the worst things in life come free to us


[Chorus 1]
          [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]Cadd9[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]
Cos she's just under the upperhand, and go mad for a couple of grams
[ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
And she don’t want to go outside tonight
         [ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
And in a pipe she flies to the Motherland, or sells love to another man
[ch]Em[/ch]         [ch]Cadd9[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D/F#[/ch]      [ch]Am7[/ch]
It’s too cold outside for angels to fly


[Bridge]        
[ch]Am7[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]*              [ch]Em[/ch]
An angel will die, covered in white
       [ch]G/F#[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]
Closed eye and hoping for a better life
[ch]Am7[/ch]                       [ch]C[/ch]*  slide [ch]Dadd4[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]*   [ch]G[/ch]*  [ch]D/F#[/ch]
This time, we’ll fade out tonight, straight down the line
                    [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]*  [ch]G[/ch]*  [ch]D/F#[/ch]
Straight down the line


[Pre-chorus]
[ch]Am7[/ch]                              [ch]C[/ch]*                   [ch]G[/ch]*
And they say she’s in the Class A Team, stuck in her daydream
                    [ch]D/F#[/ch]               [ch]Am7[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]*
Been this way since 18, but lately her face seems, slowly sinking, wasting
               [ch]G[/ch]*                            [ch]D/F#[/ch]
Crumbling like pastries, and they scream the worst things in life come free to us


[Chorus 2]
